mapper.sql: SELECT CATEGORY, CHAL_NO, CHAL_TITLE, CHAL_CONTENT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, CHAL_POINT, START_DATE, END_DATE, CHAL_STATUS FROM CHAL_TODAY
SELECT CATEGORY, CHAL_NO, CHAL_TITLE, CHAL_CONTENT, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, CHAL_POINT, CHAL_COUNT, START_DATE, END_DATE, CHAL_STATUS FROM CHAL_MONTH
mapper.select: WHERE TO_CHAR(START_DATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd') = #{ formatedNow } AND TO_CHAR(END_DATE, 'yyyy/MM/dd') = #{ formatedNow }
WHERE CHAL_NO = #{ chalNo }
SELECT CHAL_NO, CHAL_DATE FROM CHAL_TODAY_MEM WHERE MEM_NO = #{ no } AND TO_CHAR(CHAL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD')

SELECT T.CHAL_TITLE AS T_CHAL_TITLE, T.CHAL_POINT AS T_CHAL_POINT, M.RENAMED_FILENAME AS M_RENAMED_FILENAME FROM CHAL_TODAY_MEM M JOIN CHAL_TODAY T ON (M.CHAL_NO = T.CHAL_NO) WHERE M.CHAL_NO = #{ chalNo } AND M.MEM_NO = #{ no }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAL_TODAY_MEM ( NO, MEM_NO, CHAL_NO, CHAL_DATE, CHAL_STATUS, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, CHAL_POINT, CHAL_POINT_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHAL_TODAY_MEM.NEXTVAL, #{ no }, #{ chalNo }, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, #{ originalFilename }, #{ renamedFilename }, 1000, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT CHAL_NO, CHAL_DATE FROM CHAL_TODAY_MEM WHERE MEM_NO = #{ no } AND TO_CHAR(CHAL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') ORDER BY NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POINT ( POINT_NO, MEM_NO, SAVE_DATE, SAVE_CONTENT, SAVE_POINT, SPEND_DATE, DISAPEAR_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_POINT.NEXTVAL, #{ memNo }, DEFAULT, '챌린지 달성', #{ savePoint }, NULL, #{ disapearDate } )
mapper.select: SELECT M.CATEGORY, M.CHAL_NO, M.CHAL_TITLE, M.CHAL_CONTENT, M.ORIGINAL_FILENAME, M.RENAMED_FILENAME, M.CHAL_POINT, M.CHAL_COUNT, M.START_DATE, M.END_DATE, M.CHAL_STATUS, R.REPLY_NO AS R_REPLY_NO, R.MEM_NO AS R_MEM_NO, R.CHAL_NO AS R_CHAL_NO, R.CONTENT AS R_CONTENT, R.MODIFY_DATE AS R_REPLY_DATE, R.MODIFY_DATE AS R_MODIFY_DATE, N.NESTED_REPLY_NO AS N_NESTED_REPLY_NO, N.REPLY_NO AS N_REPLY_NO, N.MEM_NO AS N_MEM_NO, N.CONTENT AS N_CONTENT, N.MODIFY_DATE N_MODIFY_DATE, MEMBER.MODIFY_IMG_NAME AS R_MODIFY_IMG_NAME, MEMBER.ID AS R_ID, MEMBER2.MODIFY_IMG_NAME AS N_MODIFY_IMG_NAME, MEMBER2.ID AS N_ID FROM CHAL_MONTH M LEFT OUTER JOIN CHAL_REPLY R ON (M.CHAL_NO = R.CHAL_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN CHAL_NESTED_REPLY N ON (N.REPLY_NO = R.REPLY_NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER MEMBER ON (R.MEM_NO = MEMBER.NO) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER MEMBER2 ON (N.MEM_NO = MEMBER2.NO) WHERE M.CHAL_NO = #{ chalNo } ORDER BY R.REPLY_NO DESC, N.NESTED_REPLY_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM CHAL_MONTH WHERE CHAL_STATUS = 'Y'
ORDER BY CHAL_NO DESC

select.if: ORDER BY CHAL_POINT DESC, CHAL_NO DESC
ORDER BY CHAL_POINT ASC, CHAL_NO DESC

mapper.select: SELECT T.CHAL_TITLE AS T_CHAL_TITLE, T.CHAL_POINT AS T_CHAL_POINT, T.CHAL_NO, M.RENAMED_FILENAME AS M_RENAMED_FILENAME FROM CHAL_MONTH_MEM M JOIN CHAL_MONTH T ON (M.CHAL_NO = T.CHAL_NO) WHERE M.CHAL_NO = #{ chalNo } AND M.MEM_NO = #{ no } ORDER BY NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAL_MONTH_MEM ( NO, MEM_NO, CHAL_NO, CHAL_DATE, ORIGINAL_FILENAME, RENAMED_FILENAME, MY_COUNT, CHAL_STATUS, CHAL_POINT, CHAL_POINT_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHAL_MONTH_MEM.NEXTVAL, #{ no }, #{ chalNo }, SYSDATE, #{ originalFilename }, #{ renamedFilename }, 1, DEFAULT, 1000, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT MEMBER.MODIFY_IMG_NAME AS MEMBER_MODIFY_IMG_NAME, MEMBER.ID AS MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER MEMBER JOIN CHAL_MONTH_MEM T ON (MEMBER.NO = T.MEM_NO) WHERE CHAL_NO = #{ chalNo } AND MEM_NO != #{ no }
SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT MEM_NO) FROM MEMBER MEMBER JOIN CHAL_MONTH_MEM T ON (MEMBER.NO = T.MEM_NO) WHERE CHAL_NO = #{ chalNo } AND MEM_NO != #{ no }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAL_REPLY ( REPLY_NO, MEM_NO, CHAL_NO, CONTENT, REPLY_DATE, MODIFY_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHAL_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{ memNo }, #{ chalNo }, #{ content }, DEFAULT, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM CHAL_REPLY R JOIN CHAL_NESTED_REPLY N ON (R.REPLY_NO = N.REPLY_NO) WHERE R.REPLY_NO = #{ replyNo }
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CHAL_REPLY WHERE REPLY_NO = #{ replyNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHAL_NESTED_REPLY ( NESTED_REPLY_NO, REPLY_NO, MEM_NO, CHAL_NO, CONTENT, REPLY_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, NESTED_REPLY_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHAL_NESTED_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{ replyNo }, #{ memNo }, #{ chalNo }, #{ content }, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, DEFAULT )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CHAL_NESTED_REPLY WHERE NESTED_REPLY_NO = #{ nestedReplyNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPORT ( REPORT_NO, REPORT_M_NO, REPORTED_M_NO, REPORT_DATE, REPORT_TITLE, REPORT_CONTENT, REPORT_STATUS, REPORT_CATEGORY ) VALUES( SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, #{ reportMemberNo }, #{ reportedMemberNo }, DEFAULT, #{ reportContent }, #{ reportTitle }, DEFAULT, #{ reportCategory } )
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEM_NO AS T_MEM_NO, C.CHAL_NO, C.CHAL_TITLE AS T_CHAL_TITLE, C.CHAL_CONTENT, C.RENAMED_FILENAME AS M_RENAMED_FILENAME, C.CHAL_POINT, C.CHAL_COUNT, COUNT (M.MY_COUNT) AS M_MY_COUNT, M.MEM_NO FROM CHAL_MONTH C JOIN CHAL_MONTH_MEM M ON (C.CHAL_NO = M.CHAL_NO) WHERE M.MEM_NO = ${ no } GROUP BY M.MEM_NO, C.CHAL_NO, C.CHAL_TITLE, C.CHAL_CONTENT, C.RENAMED_FILENAME, C.CHAL_POINT, C.CHAL_COUNT, M.MY_COUNT, M.MEM_NO ORDER BY C.CHAL_NO DESC
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM (SELECT DISTINCT CHAL_NO FROM CHAL_MONTH_MEM WHERE MEM_NO = #{ no })

SELECT
C.CHAL_NO, C.CHAL_TITLE, C.CHAL_CONTENT, C.RENAMED_FILENAME FROM CHAL_MONTH_MEM M JOIN CHAL_MONTH C ON (M.CHAL_NO = C.CHAL_NO)
ORDER BY C.CHAL_NO DESC
SELECT PRO_NO, PRO_NAME, PRO_IMG, PRO_INFO, PRO_STAT, PRO_SOLD FROM PRODUCT WHERE PRO_STAT = 3 ORDER BY PRO_NO DESC
SELECT * FROM POINT WHERE MEM_NO = #{ no } AND POINT_CATEGORY = 1
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM POINT WHERE MEM_NO = #{ no } AND POINT_CATEGORY = 1
SELECT * FROM POINT WHERE MEM_NO = #{ no } AND POINT_CATEGORY = 2
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM POINT WHERE MEM_NO = #{ no } AND POINT_CATEGORY = 2
